analysis.key_quote: By stripping due process protections from career civil servants in policy-influencing positions, the rule undermines the merit-based principles established under the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 (CSRA) and threatens the constitutional separation of powers.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its constitutional and statutory concerns, emphasizing the importance of due process and merit-based protections for civil servants, and warning against the politicization of the civil service.
